e":"_borrowRate","type":"uint128"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"_autoLiquidation","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_collateralRatio","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_borrowAsset","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_borrowAssetStrategy","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_collateralAsset","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_collateralStrategy","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"_requestAsLender","type":"bool"}],"name":"request","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_id","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint128","name":"_newBorrowLimit","type":"uint128"}],"name":"updateBorrowLimit","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_min","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_max","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateBorrowLimitLimits","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_min","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_max","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateBorrowRateLimits","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_min","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_max","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateIdealCollateralRatioLimits","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_rewardFraction","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateLiquidatorRewardFraction","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_protocolFeeCollector","type":"address"}],"name": for the credit line","updatedBorrowLimit":"updated value of borrow limit"}},"BorrowedFromCreditLine(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"borrowShares":"amount of shares of tokens borrowed","id":"identifier for the credit line from which tokens are borrowed"}},"CollateralSharesDeposited(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the credit line","shares":"amount of shares of collateral deposited"}},"CollateralSharesWithdrawn(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the credit line","shares":"amount of shares of collateral withdrawn"}},"CompleteCreditLineRepaid(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the credit line","repayAmount":"amount repaid","repayer":"address of the repayer"}},"CreditLineAccepted(uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the credit line that was accepted"}},"CreditLineCancelled(uint256)":{"params":{"id":"id of the credit line that was cancelled"}},"CreditLineClosed(uint256,bool)":{"params":{"closedByLender":"is true when it is closed by lender","id":"identifier for the credit line"}},"CreditLineLiquidated(uint256,address)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the credit line which is liquidated","liquidator":"address of the liquidator"}},"CreditLineRequested(uint256,address,address,bool)":{"params":{"borrower":"address of the borrower for credit line","id":"identifier for the credit line for which request was made","lender":"address of the lender for credit line","requestByLender":"true if lender made request, false if borrower did"}},"CreditLineReset(uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the credit line that is reset"}},"LimitsUpdated(string,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"limitType":"specifies the parameter whose limits are being updated","max":"maximum threshold value for limitType","min":"minimum threshold value for limitType"}},"LiquidationRewardFractionUpdated(uint256)":{"details":"liquidatorRewardFraction is scaled by SCALING_FACTOR","params":{"liquidatorRewardFraction":"fraction of the liquidated amount given as reward to the liquidator"}},"PartialCreditLineRepaid(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the credit line","repayAmount":"amount repaid","repayer":"address of the repayer"}},"ProtocolFeeCollectorUpdated(address)":{"params":{"updatedProtocolFeeCollector":"updated value of protocolFeeCollector"}},"ProtocolFeeFractionUpdated(uint256)":{"details":"updatedProtocolFee is scaled by SCALING_FACTOR","params":{"updatedProtocolFee":"updated value of protocolFeeFraction"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"accept(uint256)":{"details":"if borrower places request, lender can accept and vice versa","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"}},"borrow(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"can only be called in ACTIVE stageonly borrower can call this function. Amount that can actually be borrowed is  min(amount based on borrowLimit, allowance to creditLine contract, balance of lender)","params":{"_amount":"amount of tokens to borrow","_id":"identifier for the credit line"}},"borrowTokensToLiquidate(uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"borrow tokens necessary for liquidator to liquidate"}},"calculateBorrowableAmount(uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view. borrowableAmount changes per block as interest changes per block.","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"amount that can be borrowed from the credit line"}},"calculateCurrentCollateralRatio(uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view. Interest is also considered while calculating debt","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"collateral ratio multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR to retain precision"}},"calculateCurrentDebt(uint256)":{"details":"Used to calculate current debt of borrower against a credit line.","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"current debt of borrower"}},"calculateInterestAccrued(uint256)":{"details":"Used to calculate interest accrued since last repayment","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"interest accrued over current borrowed amount since last repayment"}},"calculateInterestScaled(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Used to Calculate Interest Per second on given principal and Interest rate","params":{"_borrowRate":"It is the Interest Rate at which Credit Line is approved","_principal":"principal Amount for which interest has to be calculated","_timeElapsed":"It is the time interval in seconds for which interest is calculated"},"returns":{"_0":"interest per second for the given parameters scaled by SCALING_FACTOR"}},"calculateTotalCollateralTokens(uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"_amount total collateral tokens deposited into the credit line"}},"cancel(uint256)":{"details":"used to cancel credit line by borrower or lender","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"}},"close(uint256)":{"details":"used to close credit line by borrower or lender","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_usdc":"address of usdc contract"}},"depositCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"details":"collateral tokens have to be approved in savingsAccount or token contract","params":{"_amount":"amount of collateral being deposited","_fromSavingsAccount":"if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount  otherwise direct from collateral token contract","_id":"identifier for the credit line"}},"getCreditLineStatus(uint256)":{"details":"Used to get the current status of the credit line","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"credit line status"}},"initialize(address,uint256,address,uint256)":{"details":"can only be called once during the life cycle of the contract","params":{"_liquidatorRewardFraction":"fraction of the liquidated amount given as reward to the liquidator. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR","_owner":"address of owner who can change global variables","_protocolFeeCollector":"address to which protocol fee is charged to","_protocolFeeFraction":"fraction of the fee charged by protocol. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR"}},"liquidate(uint256,bool)":{"details":"if lender liquidates, then collateral is directly transferred.  If autoLiquidation is true, anyone can liquidate by providing enough borrow tokens","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line","_toSavingsAccount":"if true, shares are transferred from savingsAccount otherwise tokens are  from collateral token contract"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"repay(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"partial repayments possible","params":{"_amount":"amount being repaid","_id":"identifier for the credit line"}},"request(address,uint128,uint128,bool,uint256,address,address,address,address,bool)":{"params":{"_autoLiquidation":"if true, anyone can liquidate loan, otherwise only lender","_borrowAsset":"address of the token to be borrowed","_borrowLimit":"maximum borrow amount in a credit line","_borrowRate":"Interest Rate at which credit Line is requested. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR","_collateralAsset":"address of the token provided as collateral","_collateralRatio":"ratio of the collateral to the debt below which credit line can be liquidated. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR","_requestAsLender":"if true, lender is placing request, otherwise borrower","_requestTo":"Address to which creditLine is requested,  if borrower creates request then lender address and  if lender creates then borrower address"},"returns":{"_0":"identifier for the credit line"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updateBorrowLimit(uint256,uint128)":{"details":"can only be updated by lender","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line","_newBorrowLimit":"updated value of the borrow limit for the credit line"}},"updateBorrowLimitLimits(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_max":"updated value of the maximum threshold value of the borrow limit in lowest units of USDC","_min":"updated value of the minimum threshold value of the borrow limit in lowest units of USDC"}},"updateBorrowRateLimits(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"borrow rate limits are multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR","params":{"_max":"updated value of the maximum threshold value of the borrow rate","_min":"updated value of the minimum threshold value of the borrow rate"}},"updateIdealCollateralRatioLimits(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"ideal collateral ratio limits are multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR","params":{"_max":"updated value of the maximum threshold value of the ideal collateral ratio","_min":"updated value of the minimum threshold value of the ideal collateral ratio"}},"updateLiquidatorRewardFraction(uint256)":{"details":"can only be updated by owner. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR","params":{"_rewardFraction":"fraction of liquidated amount given to liquidator as reward"}},"updateProtocolFeeCollector(address)":{"details":"can only be updated by owner","params":{"_protocolFeeCollector":"address in which protocol fee is collected"}},"updateProtocolFeeFraction(uint256)":{"details":"can only be updated by owner. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR","params":{"_protocolFee":"fraction of the borrower amount collected as protocol fee"}},"withdrawAllCollateral(uint256,bool)":{"details":"if the withdrawable collateral amount is non-zero the transaction will pass","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line","_toSavingsAccount":"if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount  otherwise direct from collateral token contract"}},"withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"details":"collateral can't be withdraw if collateralRatio goes below the ideal value. Only borrower can withdraw","params":{"_amount":"amount of collateral to withdraw","_id":"identifier for the credit line","_toSavingsAccount":"if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount  otherwise direct from collateral token contract"}},"withdrawableCollateral(uint256)":{"details":"is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view","params":{"_id":"identifier for the credit line"},"returns":{"_0":"total collateral withdrawable by borrower"}}},"stateVariables":{"collateralShareInStrategy":{"details":"creditLineId => collateralShares*"},"creditLineCounter":{"details":"used to create unique identifier for credit lines*"},"liquidatorRewardFraction":{"details":"it is multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR to maintain precision*"},"protocolFeeFraction":{"details":"it is multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR to maintain precision*"}},"title":"Credit Line contract with Methods related to creditLines","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"BorrowLimitUpdated(uint256,uint128)":{"notice":"emitted when the borrow limit is updated for the credit line"},"BorrowedFromCreditLine(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when tokens are borrowed from credit line"},"CollateralSharesDeposited(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when a collateral is deposited into credit line"},"CollateralSharesWithdrawn(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when collateral is withdrawn from credit line"},"CompleteCreditLineRepaid(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when the credit line is completely repaid"},"CreditLineAccepted(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when credit line is accepted"},"CreditLineCancelled(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when credit line is cancelled"},"CreditLineClosed(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"emitted when the credit line is closed by one of the parties of credit line"},"CreditLineLiquidated(uint256,address)":{"notice":"emitted when a credit line is liquidated"},"CreditLineRequested(uint256,address,address,bool)":{"notice":"emitted when a request for new credit line is placed"},"CreditLineReset(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when credit line is completely repaid and reset"},"LimitsUpdated(string,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when threhsolds for one of the parameters (borrowLimitLimits, idealCollateralRatioLimits, borrowRateLimits) is updated"},"LiquidationRewardFractionUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when liquidatorRewardFraction is updated"},"PartialCreditLineRepaid(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when the credit line is partially repaid"},"ProtocolFeeCollectorUpdated(address)":{"notice":"emitted when address which receives fee that protocol changes for pools is updated"},"ProtocolFeeFractionUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when fee that protocol charges for credit line is updated"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"PRICE_ORACLE()":{"notice":"stores the instance of price oracle contract*"},"SAVINGS_ACCOUNT()":{"notice":"stores the instance of savings account contract*"},"STRATEGY_REGISTRY()":{"notice":"stores the instance of strategy registry contract*"},"accept(uint256)":{"notice":"used to accept a credit line"},"borrow(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"used to borrow tokens from credit line by borrower"},"borrowTokensToLiquidate(uint256)":{"notice":"used to calculate the borrow tokens necessary for liquidator to liquidate"},"calculateBorrowableAmount(uint256)":{"notice":"used to calculate amount that can be borrowed by the borrower"},"calculateCurrentCollateralRatio(uint256)":{"notice":"used to calculate the current collateral ratio"},"calculateTotalCollateralTokens(uint256)":{"notice":"used to calculate the total collateral tokens"},"collateralShareInStrategy(uint256)":{"notice":"stores the collateral shares in collateral strategy"},"constructor":{"notice":"used to initialize the immutables in contract"},"creditLineConstants(uint256)":{"notice":"stores the constants related to a credit line*"},"creditLineCounter()":{"notice":"counter that tracks the number of credit lines created"},"creditLineVariables(uint256)":{"notice":"stores the variables to maintain a credit line*"},"depositCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"used to deposit collateral into the credit line"},"initialize(address,uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"used to initialize the contract"},"liquidate(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"used to liquidate credit line in case collateral ratio goes below the threshold"},"liquidatorRewardFraction()":{"notice":"stores the fraction of amount liquidated given as reward to liquidator"},"protocolFeeCollector()":{"notice":"address where protocol fee is collected*"},"protocolFeeFraction()":{"notice":"stores the fraction of borrowed amount charged as fee by protocol"},"repay(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"used to repay interest and principal to credit line. Interest has to be repaid before repaying principal"},"request(address,uint128,uint128,bool,uint256,address,address,address,address,bool)":{"notice":"used to request a credit line either by borrower or lender"},"updateBorrowLimit(uint256,uint128)":{"notice":"used to update the borrow limit of the creditLine"},"updateBorrowLimitLimits(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"used to update the thresholds of the borrow limit of the credit line"},"updateBorrowRateLimits(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"used to update the thresholds of the borrow rate of the credit c76e27ab50157a9d645700cf92e3c0d51d3d860be1d2e1a0c04a87d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmfXxppWAiSTeH8YNn2EtMPDgzrLeJ5rjRq8knEbje88mX"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/utils/ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x46034cd5cca740f636345c8f7aebae0f78adfd4b70e31e6f888cccbe1086586e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0b9f36bfde7168be120a14da6c8c54cde5e5df07b79c5239752e07e5fb1ac046","dweb:/ipfs/QmZfEjoDzj3EfBkZB8X9dyBGt81tQ1KmFPuY3cz2yqWQDK"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcc78a17dd88fa5a2edc60c8489e2f405c0913b377216a5b26b35656b2d0dab52","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://526dc85e1f9b9b45830e202568d267d93dde7a4fcccf4ad7798dadcd92304d3c","dweb:/ipfs/QmaoXMB972J3cSDLtBq3xBo4jLwqD2uzXTwujtSPqkYVhR"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5f02220344881ce43204ae4a6281145a67bc52c2bb1290a791857df3d19d78f5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://24427744bd3e6cb73c17010119af12a318289c0253a4d9acb8576c9fb3797b08","dweb:/ipfs/QmTLDqpKRBuxGxRAmjgXt9AkXyACW3MtKzi7PYjm5iMfGC"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf12dfbe97e6276980b83d2830bb0eb75e0cf4f3e626c2471137f82158ae6a0fc","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b3a849c2d95e85463909e5b5c920b13e7a11216ca14127085e16d22b9379d52a","dweb:/ipfs/QmUg3CZDbCCcQdroEpexBy5ZFd5vD1UWijWQq9qHZjtJNQ"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0x28911e614500ae7c607a432a709d35da25f3bc5ddc8bd12b278b66358070c0ea","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://256c8c8af5eb072bc473226ab2b2187149b8fc04f5f4a4820db22527f5ce8e3c","dweb:/ipfs/QmRvi5BhnL7Rxf85KrJhwM6RRhukm4tzoctRdgQEheNyiN"]}},"version":1}

accept(uint256).details: if borrower places request, lender can accept and vice versa

borrow(uint256,uint256).details: can only be called in ACTIVE stageonly borrower can call this function. Amount that can actually be borrowed is  min(amount based on borrowLimit, allowance to creditLine contract, balance of lender)

borrowTokensToLiquidate(uint256).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view

returns._0: borrow tokens necessary for liquidator to liquidate

calculateBorrowableAmount(uint256).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view. borrowableAmount changes per block as interest changes per block.

returns._0: amount that can be borrowed from the credit line

calculateCurrentCollateralRatio(uint256).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view. Interest is also considered while calculating debt

returns._0: collateral ratio multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR to retain precision

calculateCurrentDebt(uint256).details: Used to calculate current debt of borrower against a credit line.

calculateInterestAccrued(uint256).details: Used to calculate interest accrued since last repayment

returns._0: interest accrued over current borrowed amount since last repayment

calculateInterestScaled(uint256,uint256,.details: Used to Calculate Interest Per second on given principal and Interest rate

params._borrowRate: It is the Interest Rate at which Credit Line is approved
params._principal: principal Amount for which interest has to be calculated
params._timeElapsed: It is the time interval in seconds for which interest is calculated

returns._0: interest per second for the given parameters scaled by SCALING_FACTOR

calculateTotalCollateralTokens(uint256).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view

returns._0: _amount total collateral tokens deposited into the credit line

cancel(uint256).details: used to cancel credit line by borrower or lender

close(uint256).details: used to close credit line by borrower or lender

depositCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool).details: collateral tokens have to be approved in savingsAccount or token contract

params._fromSavingsAccount: if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount  otherwise direct from collateral token contract

getCreditLineStatus(uint256).details: Used to get the current status of the credit line

initialize(address,uint256,address,uint2.details: can only be called once during the life cycle of the contract

params._liquidatorRewardFraction: fraction of the liquidated amount given as reward to the liquidator. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR
params._owner: address of owner who can change global variables
params._protocolFeeCollector: address to which protocol fee is charged to
params._protocolFeeFraction: fraction of the fee charged by protocol. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR

liquidate(uint256,bool).details: if lender liquidates, then collateral is directly transferred.  If autoLiquidation is true, anyone can liquidate by providing enough borrow tokens

params._toSavingsAccount: if true, shares are transferred from savingsAccount otherwise tokens are  from collateral token contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._autoLiquidation: if true, anyone can liquidate loan, otherwise only lender
params._borrowAsset: address of the token to be borrowed
params._borrowLimit: maximum borrow amount in a credit line
params._borrowRate: Interest Rate at which credit Line is requested. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR
params._collateralAsset: address of the token provided as collateral
params._collateralRatio: ratio of the collateral to the debt below which credit line can be liquidated. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR
params._requestAsLender: if true, lender is placing request, otherwise borrower
params._requestTo: Address to which creditLine is requested,  if borrower creates request then lender address and  if lender creates then borrower address

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateBorrowLimit(uint256,uint128).details: can only be updated by lender

params._newBorrowLimit: updated value of the borrow limit for the credit line

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the borrow limit in lowest units of USDC
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the borrow limit in lowest units of USDC

updateBorrowRateLimits(uint256,uint256).details: borrow rate limits are multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the borrow rate
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the borrow rate

updateIdealCollateralRatioLimits(uint256.details: ideal collateral ratio limits are multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the ideal collateral ratio
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the ideal collateral ratio

updateLiquidatorRewardFraction(uint256).details: can only be updated by owner. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR

params._rewardFraction: fraction of liquidated amount given to liquidator as reward

updateProtocolFeeCollector(address).details: can only be updated by owner

params._protocolFeeCollector: address in which protocol fee is collected

updateProtocolFeeFraction(uint256).details: can only be updated by owner. Scaled by SCALING_FACTOR

params._protocolFee: fraction of the borrower amount collected as protocol fee

withdrawAllCollateral(uint256,bool).details: if the withdrawable collateral amount is non-zero the transaction will pass

params._toSavingsAccount: if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount  otherwise direct from collateral token contract

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool).details: collateral can't be withdraw if collateralRatio goes below the ideal value. Only borrower can withdraw

params._toSavingsAccount: if true, tokens are transferred from savingsAccount  otherwise direct from collateral token contract

withdrawableCollateral(uint256).details: is a view function for the protocol itself, but isn't view because of getTokensForShares which is not view

PRICE_ORACLE().notice: stores the instance of price oracle contract*

SAVINGS_ACCOUNT().notice: stores the instance of savings account contract*

STRATEGY_REGISTRY().notice: stores the instance of strategy registry contract*

accept(uint256).notice: used to accept a credit line

borrow(uint256,uint256).notice: used to borrow tokens from credit line by borrower

borrowTokensToLiquidate(uint256).notice: used to calculate the borrow tokens necessary for liquidator to liquidate

calculateBorrowableAmount(uint256).notice: used to calculate amount that can be borrowed by the borrower

calculateCurrentCollateralRatio(uint256).notice: used to calculate the current collateral ratio

calculateTotalCollateralTokens(uint256).notice: used to calculate the total collateral tokens

collateralShareInStrategy(uint256).notice: stores the collateral shares in collateral strategy

constructor.notice: used to initialize the immutables in contract

creditLineConstants(uint256).notice: stores the constants related to a credit line*

creditLineCounter().notice: counter that tracks the number of credit lines created

creditLineVariables(uint256).notice: stores the variables to maintain a credit line*

depositCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: used to deposit collateral into the credit line

liquidate(uint256,bool).notice: used to liquidate credit line in case collateral ratio goes below the threshold

liquidatorRewardFraction().notice: stores the fraction of amount liquidated given as reward to liquidator

protocolFeeCollector().notice: address where protocol fee is collected*

protocolFeeFraction().notice: stores the fraction of borrowed amount charged as fee by protocol

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: used to repay interest and principal to credit line. Interest has to be repaid before repaying principal

request(address,uint128,uint128,bool,uin.notice: used to request a credit line either by borrower or lender

updateBorrowLimit(uint256,uint128).notice: used to update the borrow limit of the creditLine

updateBorrowLimitLimits(uint256,uint256).notice: used to update the thresholds of the borrow limit of the credit line

updateBorrowRateLimits(uint256,uint256).notice: used to update the thresholds of the borrow rate of the credit line

updateIdealCollateralRatioLimits(uint256.notice: used to update the thresholds of the ideal collateral ratio of the credit line

updateProtocolFeeCollector(address).notice: used to update the protocol fee collector

updateProtocolFeeFraction(uint256).notice: used to update the protocol fee fraction

withdrawAllCollateral(uint256,bool).notice: used to withdraw all the permissible collateral as per the current col ratio

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: used to withdraw any excess collateral

withdrawableCollateral(uint256).notice: used to calculate the collateral that can be withdrawn
